description: This table contains information specific for a refund adjustment, such as refund address information entered on the Refund Request Slip form, and information related to export and import to/from the AP system. Use this table in conjunction with ARPB_TX_REFUND_ADD to display the full address entered on the Refund Request Slip form.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: Payment transaction (ETR) ID that was refunded.

columns.name: REFUND_ADDR_NAME
columns.description: This column contains the name for the refund address entered on the Refund Request Slip form.

columns.name: REFUND_ADDR_CITY
columns.description: This column contains the city for the refund address entered on the Refund Request Slip form.

columns.name: REFUND_ADDR_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column contains the state for the refund address entered on the Refund Request Slip form.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: REFUND_ADDR_ZIP
columns.description: This column contains the zip code for the refund address entered on the Refund Request Slip form.

columns.name: REFUND_ADDR_CUST_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column contains the custom payee used to override the refund address entered on the Refund Request Slip form.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: REFUND_ADDR_PLN_ID
columns.description: This column contains the plan used to override the refund address entered on the Refund Request Slip form.

columns.name: REFUND_ADDR_PLN_ID_BENEFIT_PLAN_NAME
columns.description: The name of the benefit plan record.

columns.name: REFUND_ADDR_PYR_ID
columns.description: This column contains the payor used to override the refund address entered on the Refund Request Slip form.

columns.name: REFUND_ADDR_PYR_ID_PAYOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the payor.

columns.name: REFUND_ADDR_CVG_ID
columns.description: This column contains the coverage used to override the refund address entered on the Refund Request Slip form.

columns.name: REFUND_AP_EXPORT_DT
columns.description: Date when the refund adjustment was exported to the Accounts Payable (AP)�system

columns.name: REFUND_AP_IMPORT_DT
columns.description: Date when information was imported from Accounts Payable (AP)�system to confirm a refund

columns.name: REFUND_CHECK_NUM
columns.description: Check number for AP check produced as result of refund adjustment.

columns.name: REFUND_CHECK_AMT
columns.description: Check amount for AP check produced as result of refund adjustment.

columns.name: REFUND_CHECK_DT
columns.description: Check date for AP check produced as result of refund adjustment.

columns.name: REFUND_COMMENT
columns.description: Contains free text comment, with information related to a refund, imported from the Accounts Payable (AP) system

columns.name: REFUND_ACC_USR_ID
columns.description: This column contains the user that accepted the Refund Request Slip form.

columns.name: REFUND_ADDR_EMP_ID
columns.description: This column contains the user that overrode the refund address entered on the Refund Request Slip form.

columns.name: REFUND_ADDR_CNTY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The refund address county category ID for the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: REFUND_ADDR_CNTRY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The refund address country category ID for the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: REFUND_ADDR_HNUM
columns.description: Refund address house number

columns.name: REFUND_ADDR_DIST_C_NAME
columns.description:
The refund address district category ID for the transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: REFUND_FORCED_YN
columns.description:
If set to yes, this item indicates that the refund has been force posted or rejected (despite not having received import information from the AP system). This is only for use when refunds are held pending AP import.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: REFUND_ADDR_CUST_PAYEE_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the custom payee to send the refund to.

columns.name: REFUND_ADDR_CUST_PAYEE_ID_AGENCY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the agency.
